## 2.4 方差与标准差

如果有一个数据集，比如说：

那么可以如下来衡量这些数据的“集中”程度：

这个思路也可以用来衡量随机变量![X](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%221.98ex%22%20height%3D%222.176ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-791.3%20852.5%20936.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3EX%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-58%22%20d%3D%22M42%200H40Q26%200%2026%2011Q26%2015%2029%2027Q33%2041%2036%2043T55%2046Q141%2049%20190%2098Q200%20108%20306%20224T411%20342Q302%20620%20297%20625Q288%20636%20234%20637H206Q200%20643%20200%20645T202%20664Q206%20677%20212%20683H226Q260%20681%20347%20681Q380%20681%20408%20681T453%20682T473%20682Q490%20682%20490%20671Q490%20670%20488%20658Q484%20643%20481%20640T465%20637Q434%20634%20411%20620L488%20426L541%20485Q646%20598%20646%20610Q646%20628%20622%20635Q617%20635%20609%20637Q594%20637%20594%20648Q594%20650%20596%20664Q600%20677%20606%20683H618Q619%20683%20643%20683T697%20681T738%20680Q828%20680%20837%20683H845Q852%20676%20852%20672Q850%20647%20840%20637H824Q790%20636%20763%20628T722%20611T698%20593L687%20584Q687%20585%20592%20480L505%20384Q505%20383%20536%20304T601%20142T638%2056Q648%2047%20699%2046Q734%2046%20734%2037Q734%2035%20732%2023Q728%207%20725%204T711%201Q708%201%20678%201T589%202Q528%202%20496%202T461%201Q444%201%20444%2010Q444%2011%20446%2025Q448%2035%20450%2039T455%2044T464%2046T480%2047T506%2054Q523%2062%20523%2064Q522%2064%20476%20181L429%20299Q241%2095%20236%2084Q232%2076%20232%2072Q232%2053%20261%2047Q262%2047%20267%2047T273%2046Q276%2046%20277%2046T280%2045T283%2042T284%2035Q284%2026%20282%2019Q279%206%20276%204T261%201Q258%201%20243%201T201%202T142%202Q64%202%2042%200Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-58%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)的“集中”程度，不过对于随机变量，我们不使用算术平均，而是用加权平均，或者说期望。



### 2.4.1 方差的定义

代数式：
$$
\operatorname{Var}(X)=E\left[(X-E(X))^{2}\right]
$$
或（在浙江大学的教材中用的是下列符号）：
$$
D(X)=E\left[(X-E(X))^{2}\right]
$$
称为随机变量![X](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%221.98ex%22%20height%3D%222.176ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-791.3%20852.5%20936.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3EX%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-58%22%20d%3D%22M42%200H40Q26%200%2026%2011Q26%2015%2029%2027Q33%2041%2036%2043T55%2046Q141%2049%20190%2098Q200%20108%20306%20224T411%20342Q302%20620%20297%20625Q288%20636%20234%20637H206Q200%20643%20200%20645T202%20664Q206%20677%20212%20683H226Q260%20681%20347%20681Q380%20681%20408%20681T453%20682T473%20682Q490%20682%20490%20671Q490%20670%20488%20658Q484%20643%20481%20640T465%20637Q434%20634%20411%20620L488%20426L541%20485Q646%20598%20646%20610Q646%20628%20622%20635Q617%20635%20609%20637Q594%20637%20594%20648Q594%20650%20596%20664Q600%20677%20606%20683H618Q619%20683%20643%20683T697%20681T738%20680Q828%20680%20837%20683H845Q852%20676%20852%20672Q850%20647%20840%20637H824Q790%20636%20763%20628T722%20611T698%20593L687%20584Q687%20585%20592%20480L505%20384Q505%20383%20536%20304T601%20142T638%2056Q648%2047%20699%2046Q734%2046%20734%2037Q734%2035%20732%2023Q728%207%20725%204T711%201Q708%201%20678%201T589%202Q528%202%20496%202T461%201Q444%201%20444%2010Q444%2011%20446%2025Q448%2035%20450%2039T455%2044T464%2046T480%2047T506%2054Q523%2062%20523%2064Q522%2064%20476%20181L429%20299Q241%2095%20236%2084Q232%2076%20232%2072Q232%2053%20261%2047Q262%2047%20267%2047T273%2046Q276%2046%20277%2046T280%2045T283%2042T284%2035Q284%2026%20282%2019Q279%206%20276%204T261%201Q258%201%20243%201T201%202T142%202Q64%202%2042%200Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke- ### 2.4.2 二阶矩

方差可以写作：

0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3Cg%20fill%3D%22Salmon%22%20stroke%3D%22Salmon%22%20transform%3D%22translate(777%2C0)%22%3E%0A%3Cg%20fill%3D%22Salmon%22%20stroke%3D%22Salmon%22%3E%0A%3Cg%20fill%3D%22Salmon%22%20stroke%3D%22Salmon%22%3E%0A%3Ctext%20font-family%3D%22monospace%22%20stroke%3D%22none%22%20transform%3D%22scale(59.79916666666667)%20matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%3E%E9%98%B6%3C%2Ftext%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3Cg%20fill%3D%22Salmon%22%20stroke%3D%22Salmon%22%20transform%3D%22translate(1554%2C0)%22%3E%0A%3Cg%20fill%3D%22Salmon%22%20stroke%3D%22Salmon%22%3E%0A%3Cg%20fill%3D%22Salmon%22%20stroke%3D%22Salmon%22%3E%0A%3Ctext%20font-family%3D%22monospace%22%20stroke%3D%22none%22%20transform%3D%22scale(59.79916666666667)%20matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%3E%E7%9F%A9%3C%2Ftext%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)（这在物理中对应惯性矩，因为不是高中知识了，这里就不再介绍了）。



### 2.4.3 方差的各种计算公式

$$
E\left[(X-\mu)^{2}\right]=\frac{\left(X_{1}-\bar{X}\right)^{2}+\left(X_{2}-\bar{X}\right)^{2}+\cdots+\left(X_{n}-\bar{X}\right)^{2}}{n}
$$


$$
E\left[(X-\mu)^{2}\right]=\sum_{i}\left(x_{i}-\mu\right)^{2} p\left(x_{i}\right)
$$

$$
\begin{aligned}
E\left[(X-\mu)^{2}\right]&=
\mathrm{E}\left[X^{2}-2 X \mathrm{E}[X]+(\mathrm{E}[X])^{2}\right]\\
&=\mathrm{E}\left[X^{2}\right]-2 \mathrm{E}[X] \mathrm{E}[X]+(\mathrm{E}[X])^{2}\\
&=\mathrm{E}\left[X^{2}\right]-(\mathrm{E}[X])^{2}
\end{aligned}
$$


### 2.4.4 标准差

方差有一个问题，单位与随机变量不同，由于方差的运算中存在平方，因此方差的单位为随机变量单位的平方。为了与随机变量比较，我们需要将方差的单位换算成随机变量的单位，这里我们引入标准差的概念：

假如随机变量![X](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%221.98ex%22%20height%3D%222.176ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-791.3%20852.5%20936.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3EX%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-58%22%20d%3D%22M42%200H40Q26%200%2026%2011Q26%2015%2029%2027Q33%2041%2036%2043T55%2046Q141%2049%20190%2098Q200%20108%20306%20224T411%20342Q302%20620%20297%20625Q288%20636%20234%20637H206Q200%20643%20200%20645T202%20664Q206%20677%20212%20683H226Q260%20681%20347%20681Q380%20681%20408%20681T453%20682T473%20682Q490%20682%20490%20671Q490%20670%20488%20658Q484%20643%20481%20640T465%20637Q434%20634%20411%20620L488%20426L541%20485Q646%20598%20646%20610Q646%20628%20622%20635Q617%20635%20609%20637Q594%20637%20594%20648Q594%20650%20596%20664Q600%20677%20606%20683H618Q619%20683%20643%20683T697%20681T738%20680Q828%20680%20837%20683H845Q852%20676%20852%20672Q850%20647%20840%20637H824Q790%20636%20763%20628T722%20611T698%20593L687%20584Q687%20585%20592%20480L505%20384Q505%20383%20536%20304T601%20142T638%2056Q648%2047%20699%2046Q734%2046%20734%2037Q734%2035%20732%2023Q728%207%20725%204T711%201Q708%201%20678%201T589%202Q528%202%20496%202T461%201Q444%201%20444%2010Q444%2011%20446%2025Q448%2035%20450%2039T455%2044T464%2046T480%2047T506%2054Q523%2062%20523%2064Q522%2064%20476%20181L429%20299Q241%2095%20236%2084Q232%2076%20232%2072Q232%2053%20261%2047Q262%2047%20267%2047T273%2046Q276%2046%20277%2046T280%2045T283%2042T284%2035Q284%2026%20282%2019Q279%206%20276%204T261%201Q258%201%20243%201T201%202T142%202Q64%202%2042%200Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke- ### 2.4.5 方差的性质

- **化简**：可以通过下式来化简运算：

（1）伯努利分布的方差可以如下计算：

然后：

23E1-MJMATHI-70%22%20x%3D%2213284%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-2212%22%20x%3D%2214010%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3Cg%20transform%3D%22translate(15011%2C0)%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-70%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20transform%3D%22scale(0.707)%22%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-32%22%20x%3D%22712%22%20y%3D%22583%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-3D%22%20x%3D%2216246%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-70%22%20x%3D%2217302%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-28%22%20x%3D%2217806%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-31%22%20x%3D%2218195%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-2212%22%20x%3D%2218918%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-70%22%20x%3D%2219919%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-29%22%20x%3D%2220422%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)

（2）二项分布的方差可以如下计算：

![ \begin{aligned}     E(X^2)         &=\sum_{k=0}^n k^2{n\choose k}p^k(1-p)^{n-k}\\         \\         &=\sum_{k=0}^n (k+1-1)k{n\choose k}p^k(1-p)^{n-k}\\         \\         &=\sum_{k=0}^n (k-1)k{n\choose k}p^k(1-p)^{n-k}+\sum_{k=0}^n k{n\choose k}p^k(1-p)^{n-k}\\         \\         &=\sum_{k=0}^n (k-1)k{n\choose k}p^k(1-p)^{n-k}+np\\         \\         &=n(n-1)p^2\sum_{k=2}^n {n-2\choose k-2}p^{k-2}(1-p)^{(n-2)-(k-2)}+np\\         \\         &=n(n-1)p^2+np \end{aligned} 0](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%2213.807ex%22%20height%3D%222.843ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.838ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-863.1%205944.5%201223.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3Enp(1-p)%5Cgeq%200%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-6E%22%20d%3D%22M21%20287Q22%20293%2024%20303T36%20341T56%20388T89%20425T135%20442Q171%20442%20195%20424T225%20390T231%20369Q231%20367%20232%20367L243%20378Q304%20442%20382%20442Q436%20442%20469%20415T503%20336T465%20179T427%2052Q427%2026%20444%2026Q450%2026%20453%2027Q482%2032%20505%2065T540%20145Q542%20153%20560%20153Q580%20153%20580%20145Q580%20144%20576%20130Q568%20101%20554%2073T508%2017T439%20-10Q392%20-10%20371%2017T350%2073Q350%2092%20386%20193T423%20345Q423%20404%20379%20404H374Q288%20404%20229%20303L222%20291L189%20157Q156%2026%20151%2016Q138%20-11%20108%20-11Q95%20-11%2087%20-5T76%207T74%2017Q74%2030%20112%20180T152%20343Q153%20348%20153%20366Q153%20405%20129%20405Q91%20405%2066%20305Q60%20285%2060%20284Q58%20278%2041%20278H27Q21%20284%2021%20287Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-70%22%20d%3D%22M23%20287Q24%20290%2025%20295T30%20317T40%20348T55%20381T75%20411T101%20433T134%20442Q209%20442%20230%20378L240%20387Q302%20442%20358%20442Q423%20442%20460%20395T497%20281Q497%20173%20421%2082T249%20-10Q227%20-10%20210%20-4Q199%201%20187%2011T168%2028L161%2036Q160%2035%20139%20-51T118%20-138Q118%20-144%20126%20-145T163%20-148H188Q194%20-155%20194%20-157T191%20-175Q188%20-187%20185%20-190T172%20-194Q170%20-194%20161%20-194T127%20-193T65%20-192Q-5%20-192%20-24%20-194H-32Q-39%20-187%20-39%20-183Q-37%20-156%20-26%20-148H-6Q28%20-147%2033%20-136Q36%20-130%209 ### 2.4.7 马尔可夫不等式

#### 2.4.7.1 平均身高的例子

“中国男人平均身高![1.718](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%225.297ex%22%20height%3D%222.176ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-791.3%202280.5%20936.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E1.718%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-31%22%20d%3D%22M213%20578L200%20573Q186%20568%20160%20563T102%20556H83V602H102Q149%20604%20189%20617T245%20641T273%20663Q275%20666%20285%20666Q294%20666%20302%20660V361L303%2061Q310%2054%20315%2052T339%2048T401%2046H427V0H416Q395%203%20257%203Q121%203%20100%200H88V46H114Q136%2046%20152%2046T177%2047T193%2050T201%2052T207%2057T213%2061V578Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-2E%22%20d%3D%22M78%2060Q78%2084%2095%20102T138%20120Q162%20120%20180%20104T199%2061Q199%2036%20182%2018T139%200T96%2017T78%2060Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-37%22%20d%3D%22M55%20458Q56%20460%2072%20567L88%20674Q88%20676%20108%20676H128V672Q128%20662%20143%20655T195%20646T364%20644H485V605L417%20512Q408%20500%20387%20472T360%20435T339%20403T319%20367T305%20330T292%20284T284%20230T278%20162T275%2080Q275%2066%20275%2052T274%2028V19Q270%202%20255%20-10T221%20-22Q210%20-22%20200%20-19T179%200T168%2040Q168%20198%20265%20368Q285%20400%20349%20489L395%20552H302Q128%20552%20119%20546Q113%20543%20108%20522T98%20479L95%20458V455H55V458Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-38%22%20d%3D%22M70%20417T70%20494T124%20618T248%20666Q319%20666%20374%20624T429%20515Q429%20485%20418%20459T392%20417T361%20389T335%20371T324%20363L338%20354Q352%20344%20366%20334T382%20323Q457%20264%20457%20174Q457%2095%20399%2037T249%20-22Q159%20 由于身高一定大于0的，所以上面累加的每一项都是正数，从而可得：

在身高为正的前提下，下面不等式是成立的：

进而推出：
$$
171.8(P(X=171.8)+P(X=172.8)+\cdots)=171.8 P(X \geq 171.8) \leq E(X)
$$

#### 2.4.7.2 马尔可夫不等式定义

设![X](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%221.98ex%22%20height%3D%222.176ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-791.3%20852.5%20936.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3EX%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-58%22%20d%3D%22M42%200H40Q26%200%2026%2011Q26%2015%2029%2027Q33%2041%2036%2043T55%2046Q141%2049%20190%2098Q200%20108%20306%20224T411%20342Q302%20620%20297%20625Q288%20636%20234%20637H206Q200%20643%20200%20645T202%20664Q206%20677%20212%20683H226Q260%20681%20347%20681Q380%20681%20408%20681T453%20682T473%20682Q490%20682%20490%20671Q490%20670%20488%20658Q484%20643%20481%20640T465%20637Q434%20634%20411%20620L488%20426L541%20485Q646%20598%20646%20610Q646%20628%20622%20635Q617%20635%20609%20637Q594%20637%20594%20648Q594%20650%20596%20664Q600%20677%20606%20683H618Q619%20683%20643%20683T697%20681T738%20680Q828%20680%20837%20683H845Q852%20676%20852%20672Q850%20647%20840%20637H824Q790%20636%20763%20628T722%20611T698%20593L687%20584Q687%20585%20592%20480L505%20384Q505%20383%20536%20304T601%20142T638%2056Q648%2047%20699%2046Q734%2046%20734%2037Q734%2035%20732%2023Q728%207%20725%204T711%201Q708%201%20678%201T589%202Q528%202%20496%202T461%201Q444%201%20444%2010Q444%2011%20446%2025Q448%2035%20450%2039T455%2044T464%2046T480%2047T506%2054Q523%2062%20523%2064Q522%2064%20476%20181L429%20299Q241%2095%20236%2084Q232%2076%20232%2072Q232%2053%20261%2047Q262%2047%20267%2047T273%2046Q276%2046%20277%2046T280%2045T283%2042T284%2035Q284%2026%20282%2019Q279%206%20276%204T261%201Q258%201%20243%201T201%202T142%202Q64%202%2042%200Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width > 20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-58%22%20x%3D%221154%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-29%22%20x%3D%222006%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-61%22%20x%3D%22993%22%20y%3D%22-686%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)



#### 2.4.7.3 马尔可夫不等式的应用

- 不超过1/5的人口会有超过5倍于人均收入的收入。
- 证明一个非负的随机变数，其平均值![\mu ](概率论2.images/9fd47b2a39f7a7856952afec1f1db72c67af6161.svg)和中位数![m](概率论2.images/0a07d98bb302f3856cbabc47b2b9016692e3f7bc.svg)满足![m\leq 2\mu ](概率论2.images/d416563e3c26046abb229df0bfaab0179a513206.svg)的关系

> 例题

所以不会超过![10\%](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%224.261ex%22%20height%3D%222.343ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-863.1%201834.5%201008.6%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E10%5C%25%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-31%22%20d%3D%22M213%20578L200%20573Q186%20568%20160%20563T102%20556H83V602H102Q149%20604%20189%20617T245%20641T273%20663Q275%20666%20285%20666Q294%20666%20302%20660V361L303%2061Q310%2054%20315%2052T339%2048T401%2046H427V0H416Q395%203%20257%203Q121%203%20100%200H88V46H114Q136%2046%20152%2046T177%2047T193%2050T201%2052T207%2057T213%2061V578Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-30%22%20d%3D%22M96%20585Q152%20666%20249%20666Q297%20666%20345%20640T423%20548Q460%20465%20460%20320Q460%20165%20417%2083Q397%2041%20362%2016T301%20-15T250%20-22Q224%20-22%20198%20-16T137%2016T82%2083Q39%20165%2039%20320Q39%20494%2096%20585ZM321%20597Q291%20629%20250%20629Q208%20629%20178%20597Q153%20571%20145%20525T137%20333Q137%20175%20145%20125T181%2046Q209%2016%20250%2016Q290%2016%20318%2046Q347%2076%20354%20130T362%20333Q362%20478%20354%20524T321%20597Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMAIN-25%22%20d%3D%22M465%20605Q428%20605%20394%20614T340%20632T319%20641Q332%20608%20332%20548Q332%20458%20293%20403T202%20347Q145%20347%20101%20402T56%20548Q56%20637%20101%20693T202%20750Q241%20750%20272%20719Q359%20642%20464%20642Q580%20642%20650%20732Q662%20748%20668%20749Q670%20750%20673%20750Q682%20750%20688%20743T693%20726Q178%20-47%20170%20-52Q166%20-56%20160%20-56Q147%20-56%20142%20-45Q137%20-36%20142%20-27Q143%20-24%20363%20304Q469%20462%20525%20546T581%20630Q528%20605%20465%20605ZM207%20385Q235%20385%20263%20427T292%20548Q292%20617%20267%20664T200%20712Q193%20712%20186%20709T167%20698T147%20668T134%20615Q132%20595%20132%20548V527Q132%20436%20165%20403Q183%20385%20203%20385H207ZM500%20146Q500%20234%20544%20290T647%20347Q699%20347%20737%20292T776%20146T737%200T646%20-56Q590%20-56%20545%200T500%20146ZM651%20-18Q679%20-18%20707%2024T736%20146Q736%20215%20711%20262T644%20309Q637%20309%20630%20306T611%20295T591%20265T578%20212Q577%20200%20577%20146V124Q577%20-18%20647%20-18H651Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-31%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-30%22%20x%3D%22500%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-25%22%20x%3D%221001%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)。
>
> 当然据说官方统计出来的数据为，年入超过百万的人真正占比为万分之四，所以马尔可夫不等式给出的估计偏差还是比较大的。



### 2.4.8 切比雪夫不等式

#### 2.4.8.1 切比雪夫不等式的定义

设![X](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%221.98ex%22%20height%3D%222.176ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-791.3%20852.5%20936.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3EX%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-58%22%20d%3D%22M42%200H40Q26%200%2026%2011Q26%2015%2029%2027Q33%2041%2036%2043T55%2046Q141%2049%20190%2098Q200%20108%20306%20224T411%20342Q302%20620%20297%20625Q288%20636%20234%20637H206Q200%20643%20200%20645T202%20664Q206%20677%20212%20683H226Q260%20681%20347%20681Q380%20681%20408%20681T453%20682T473%20682Q490%20682%20490%20671Q490%20670%20488%20658Q484%20643%20481%20640T465%20637Q434%20634%20411%20620L488%20426L541%20485Q646%20598%20646%20610Q646%20628%20622%20635Q617%20635%20609%20637Q594%20637%20594%20648Q594%20650%20596%20664Q600%20677%20606%20683H618Q619%20683%20643%20683T697%20681T738%20680Q828%20680%20837%20683H845Q852%20676%20852%20672Q850%20647%20840%20637H824Q790%20636%20763%20628T722%20611T698%20593L687%20584Q687%20585%20592%20480L505%20384Q505%20383%20536%20304T601%20142T638%2056Q648%2047%20699%2046Q734%2046%20734%2037Q734%2035%20732%2023Q728%207%20725%204T711%201Q708%201%20678%201T589%202Q528%202%20496%202T461%201Q444%201%20444%2010Q444%2011%20446%2025Q448%2035%20450%2039T455%2044T464%2046T480%2047T506%2054Q523%2062%20523%2064Q522%2064%20476%20181L429%20299Q241%2095%20236%2084Q232%2076%20232%2072Q232%2053%20261%2047Q262%2047%20267%2047T273%2046Q276%2046%20277%2046T280%2045T283%2042T284%2035Q284%2026%20282%2019Q279%206%20276%204T261%201Q258%201%20243%201T201%202T142%202Q64%202%2042%200Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width #### 2.4.8.2 切比雪夫不等式的证明

>
> 也就是千分之二左右，比之前的马尔可夫不等式估计出来的值要小多了。



#### 2.4.8.3 切比雪夫不等式的意义

## 2.5 泊松分布

要求的概率为：

泊松分布

### 2.5.1 定义 期望与方差

对于随机变量![X](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%221.98ex%22%20height%3D%222.176ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-791.3%20852.5%20936.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3EX%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-58%22%20d%3D%22M42%200H40Q26%200%2026%2011Q26%2015%2029%2027Q33%2041%2036%2043T55%2046Q141%2049%20190%2098Q200%20108%20306%20224T411%20342Q302%20620%20297%20625Q288%20636%20234%20637H206Q200%20643%20200%20645T202%20664Q206%20677%20212%20683H226Q260%20681%20347%20681Q380%20681%20408%20681T453%20682T473%20682Q490%20682%20490%20671Q490%20670%20488%20658Q484%20643%20481%20640T465%20637Q434%20634%20411%20620L488%20426L541%20485Q646%20598%20646%20610Q646%20628%20622%20635Q617%20635%20609%20637Q594%20637%20594%20648Q594%20650%20596%20664Q600%20677%20606%20683H618Q619%20683%20643%20683T697%20681T738%20680Q828%20680%20837%20683H845Q852%20676%20852%20672Q850%20647%20840%20637H824Q790%20636%20763%20628T722%20611T698%20593L687%20584Q687%20585%20592%20480L505%20384Q505%20383%20536%20304T601%20142T638%2056Q648%2047%20699%2046Q734%2046%20734%2037Q734%2035%20732%2023Q728%207%20725%204T711%201Q708%201%20678%201T589%202Q528%202%20496%202T461%201Q444%201%20444%2010Q444%2011%20446%2025Q448%2035%20450%2039T455%2044T464%2046T480%2047T506%2054Q523%2062%20523%2064Q522%2064%20476%20181L429%20299Q241%2095%20236%2084Q232%2076%20232%2072Q232%2053%20261%2047Q262%2047%20267%2047T273%2046Q276%2046%20277%2046T280%2045T283%2042T284%2035Q284%2026%20282%2019Q279%206%20276%204T261%201Q258%201%20243%201T201%202T142%202Q64%202%2042%200Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke- 其数学期望和方差为：

期望可以这么计算：

通过之前的推导，我们知道![\lambda](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%221.355ex%22%20height%3D%222.176ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-791.3%20583.5%20936.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%5Clambda%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-3BB%22%20d%3D%22M166%20673Q166%20685%20183%20694H202Q292%20691%20316%20644Q322%20629%20373%20486T474%20207T524%2067Q531%2047%20537%2034T546%2015T551%206T555%202T556%20-2T550%20-11H482Q457%203%20450%2018T399%20152L354%20277L340%20262Q327%20246%20293%20207T236%20141Q211%20112%20174%2069Q123%209%20111%20-1T83%20-12Q47%20-12%2047%2020Q47%2037%2061%2052T199%20187Q229%20216%20266%20252T321%20306L338%20322Q338%20323%20288%20462T234%20612Q214%20657%20183%20657Q166%20657%20166%20673Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-3BB%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)其实是对应的二项分布的![\mu](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%221.402ex%22%20height%3D%222.176ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.838ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-576.1%20603.5%20936.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%5Cmu%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-3BC%22%20d%3D%22M58%20-216Q44%20-216%2034%20-208T23%20-186Q23%20-176%2096%20116T173%20414Q186%20442%20219%20442Q231%20441%20239%20435T249%20423T251%20413Q251%20401%20220%20279T187%20142Q185%20131%20185%20107V99Q185%2026%20252%2026Q261%2026%20270%2027T287%2031T302%2038T315%2045T327%2055T338%2065T348%2077T356%2088T365%20100L372%20110L408%20253Q444%20395%20448%20404Q461%20431%20491%20431Q504%20431%20512%20424T523%20412T525%20402L449%2084Q448%2079%20448%2068Q448%2043%20455%2035T476%2026Q485%2027%20496%2035Q517%2055%20537%20131Q543%20151%20547%20152Q549%20153%20557%20153H561Q580%20153%20580%20144Q580%20138%20575%20117T555%2063T523%2013Q510%200%20491%20-8Q483%20-10%20467%20-10Q446%20-10%20429%20-4T402%2011T385%2029T376%2044T374%2051L368%2045Q362%2039%20350%2030T324%2012T288%20-4T246%20-11Q199%20-11%20153%2012L129%20-85Q108%20-167%20104%20-180T92%20-202Q76%20-216%2058%20-216Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-3BC%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)，所以泊松分布的期望和对应的二项分布的期望相同。

又有：

&=\sum_{k=1}^{\infty}[(k-1)+1]\frac{\lambda^k}{(k-1)!}e^{-\lambda}\\         \\         &=\lambda^2e^{-\lambda}\sum_{k=2}^{\infty}\frac{\lambda^{k-2}}{(k-2)!}+\lambda 43%20455%2035T476%2026Q485%2027%20496%2035Q517%2055%20537%20131Q543%20151%20547%20152Q549%20153%20557%20153H561Q580%20153%20580%20144Q580%20138%20575%20117T555%2063T523%2013Q510%200%20491%20-8Q483%20-10%20467%20-10Q446%20-10%20429%20-4T402%2011T385%2029T376%2044T374%2051L368%2045Q362%2039%20350%2030T324%2012T288%20-4T246%20-11Q199%20-11%20153%2012L129%20-85Q108%20-167%20104%20-180T92%20-202Q76%20-216%2058%20-216Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-3BB%22%20d%3D%22M166%20673Q166%20685%20183%20694H202Q292%20691%20316%20644Q322%20629%20373%20486T474%20207T524%2067Q531%2047%20537%2034T546%2015T551%206T555%202T556%20-2T550%20-11H482Q457%203%20450%2018T399%20152L354%20277L340%20262Q327%20246%20293%20207T236%20141Q211%20112%20174%2069Q123%209%20111%20-1T83%20-12Q47%20-12%2047%2020Q47%2037%2061%2052T199%20187Q229%20216%20266%20252T321%20306L338%20322Q338%20323%20288%20462T234%20612Q214%20657%20183%20657Q166%20657%20166%20673Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-56%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-61%22%20x%3D%22769%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-72%22%20x%3D%221299%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-28%22%20x%3D%221750%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-58%22%20x%3D%222140%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-29%22%20x%3D%222992%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-3D%22%20x%3D%223659%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-45%22%20x%3D%224716%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-28%22%20x%3D%225480%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3Cg%20transform%3D%22translate(5870%2C0)%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-58%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20transform%3D%22scale(0.707)%22%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-32%22%20x%3D%221215%22%20y%3D%22583%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-29%22%20x%3D%227183%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-2212%22%20x%3D%227795%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3Cg%20transform%3D%22translate(8796%2C0)%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-3BC%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20transform%3D%22scale(0.707)%22%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-32%22%20x%3D%22853%22%20y%3D%22583%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMAIN-3D%22%20x%3D%2210131%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-3BB%22%20x%3D%2211187%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)



### 2.5.2 泊松分布的条件

一般地，在某一段时间![T](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%221.636ex%22%20height%3D%222.176ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-791.3%20704.5%20936.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3ET%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-54%22%20d%3D%22M40%20437Q21%20437%2021%20445Q21%20450%2037%20501T71%20602L88%20651Q93%20669%20101%20677H569H659Q691%20677%20697%20676T704%20667Q704%20661%20687%20553T668%20444Q668%20437%20649%20437Q640%20437%20637%20437T631%20442L629%20445Q629%20451%20635%20490T641%20551Q641%20586%20628%20604T573%20629Q568%20630%20515%20631Q469%20631%20457%20630T439%20622Q438%20621%20368%20343T298%2060Q298%2048%20386%2046Q418%2046%20427%2045T436%2036Q436%2031%20433%2022Q429%204%20424%201L422%200Q419%200%20415%200Q410%200%20363%201T228%202Q99%202%2064%200H49Q43%206%2043%209T45%2027Q49%2040%2055%2046H83H94Q174%2046%20189%2055Q190%2056%20191%2056Q196%2059%20201%2076T241%20233Q258%20301%20269%20344Q339%20619%20339%20625Q339%20630%20310%20630H279Q212%20630%20191%20624Q146%20614%20121%20583T67%20467Q60%20445%2057%20441T43%20437H40Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-54%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)内发生特定事件的次数，如果满足以下假设，都可以看作泊松分布：

- **平稳性**：在此时间段![T](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%221.636ex%22%20height%3D%222.176ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-791.3%20704.5%20936.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3ET%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-54%22%20d%3D%22M40%20437Q21%20437%2021%20445Q21%20450%2037%20501T71%20602L88%20651Q93%20669%20101%20677H569H659Q691%20677%20697%20676T704%20667Q704%20661%20687%20553T668%20444Q668%20437%20649%20437Q640%20437%20637%20437T631%20442L629%20445Q629%20451%20635%20490T641%20551Q641%20586%20628%20604T573%20629Q568%20630%20515%20631Q469%20631%20457%20630T439%20622Q438%20621%20368%20343T298%2060Q298%2048%20386%2046Q418%2046%20427%2045T436%2036Q436%2031%20433%2022Q429%204%20424%201L422%200Q419%200%20415%200Q410%200%20363%201T228%202Q99%202%2064%200H49Q43%206%2043%209T45%2027Q49%2040%2055%2046H83H94Q174%2046%20189%2055Q190%2056%20191%2056Q196%2059%20201%2076T241%20233Q258%20301%20269%20344Q339%20619%20339%20625Q339%20630%20310%20630H279Q212%20630%20191%20624Q146%20614%20121%20583T67%20467Q60%20445%2057%20441T43%20437H40Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-54%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)内，此事件发生的概率相同（在实际应用中大致相同就可以了）
- **独立性**：事件的发生彼此之间独立（或者说，关联性很弱）
- **普通性**：把![T](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%221.636ex%22%20height%3D%222.176ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-791.3%20704.5%20936.9%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3ET%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-54%22%20d%3D%22M40%20437Q21%20437%2021%20445Q21%20450%2037%20501T71%20602L88%20651Q93%20669%20101%20677H569H659Q691%20677%20697%20676T704%20667Q704%20661%20687%20553T668%20444Q668%20437%20649%20437Q640%20437%20637%20437T631%20442L629%20445Q629%20451%20635%20490T641%20551Q641%20586%20628%20604T573%20629Q568%20630%20515%20631Q469%20631%20457%20630T439%20622Q438%20621%20368%20343T298%2060Q298%2048%20386%2046Q418%2046%20427%2045T436%2036Q436%2031%20433%2022Q429%204%20424%201L422%200Q419%200%20415%200Q410%200%20363%201T228%202Q99%202%2064%200H49Q43%206%2043%209T45%2027Q49%2040%2055%2046H83H94Q174%2046%20189%2055Q190%2056%20191%2056Q196%2059%20201%2076T241%20233Q258%20301%20269%20344Q339%20619%20339%20625Q339%20630%20310%20630H279Q212%20630%20191%20624Q146%20614%20121%20583T67%20467Q60%20445%2057%20441T43%20437H40Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-54%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)切分成足够小的区间![\Delta > 放射出的![\alpha](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%221.488ex%22%20height%3D%221.676ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-576.1%20640.5%20721.6%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%5Calpha%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-3B1%22%20d%3D%22M34%20156Q34%20270%20120%20356T309%20442Q379%20442%20421%20402T478%20304Q484%20275%20485%20237V208Q534%20282%20560%20374Q564%20388%20566%20390T582%20393Q603%20393%20603%20385Q603%20376%20594%20346T558%20261T497%20161L486%20147L487%20123Q489%2067%20495%2047T514%2026Q528%2028%20540%2037T557%2060Q559%2067%20562%2068T577%2070Q597%2070%20597%2062Q597%2056%20591%2043Q579%2019%20556%205T512%20-10H505Q438%20-10%20414%2062L411%2069L400%2061Q390%2053%20370%2041T325%2018T267%20-2T203%20-11Q124%20-11%2079%2039T34%20156ZM208%2026Q257%2026%20306%2047T379%2090L403%20112Q401%20255%20396%20290Q382%20405%20304%20405Q235%20405%20183%20332Q156%20292%20139%20224T121%20120Q121%2071%20146%2049T208%2026Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-3B1%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)粒子数是服从泊松分布。

### 2.5.3 欧松定理

泊松分布实际上是二项分布的极限：

这个概率计算量很大，由于![n](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%221.395ex%22%20height%3D%221.676ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-576.1%20600.5%20721.6%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3En%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-6E%22%20d%3D%22M21%20287Q22%20293%2024%20303T36%20341T56%20388T89%20425T135%20442Q171%20442%20195%20424T225%20390T231%20369Q231%20367%20232%20367L243%20378Q304%20442%20382%20442Q436%20442%20469%20415T503%20336T465%20179T427%2052Q427%2026%20444%2026Q450%2026%20453%2027Q482%2032%20505%2065T540%20145Q542%20153%20560%20153Q580%20153%20580%20145Q580%20144%20576%20130Q568%20101%20554%2073T508%2017T439%20-10Q392%20-10%20371%2017T350%2073Q350%2092%20386%20193T423%20345Q423%20404%20379%20404H374Q288%20404%20229%20303L222%20291L189%20157Q156%2026%20151%2016Q138%20-11%20108%20-11Q95%20-11%2087%20-5T76%207T74%2017Q74%2030%20112%20180T152%20343Q153%20348%20153%20366Q153%20405%20129%20405Q91%20405%2066%20305Q60%20285%2060%20284Q58%20278%2041%20278H27Q21%20284%2021%20287Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-6E%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)很大，![p](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%221.259ex%22%20height%3D%222.009ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.671ex%3B%20margin-left%3A%20-0.089ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%22-38.5%20-576.1%20542%20865.1%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable > 当![n](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3Axlink%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxlink%22%20width%3D%221.395ex%22%20height%3D%221.676ex%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A14px%3Bvertical-align%3A%20-0.338ex%3B%22%20viewBox%3D%220%20-576.1%20600.5%20721.6%22%20role%3D%22img%22%20focusable%3D%22false%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20aria-labelledby%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3E%0A%3Ctitle%20id%3D%22MathJax-SVG-1-Title%22%3En%3C%2Ftitle%3E%0A%3Cdefs%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%3Cpath%20stroke-width%3D%221%22%20id%3D%22E1-MJMATHI-6E%22%20d%3D%22M21%20287Q22%20293%2024%20303T36%20341T56%20388T89%20425T135%20442Q171%20442%20195%20424T225%20390T231%20369Q231%20367%20232%20367L243%20378Q304%20442%20382%20442Q436%20442%20469%20415T503%20336T465%20179T427%2052Q427%2026%20444%2026Q450%2026%20453%2027Q482%2032%20505%2065T540%20145Q542%20153%20560%20153Q580%20153%20580%20145Q580%20144%20576%20130Q568%20101%20554%2073T508%2017T439%20-10Q392%20-10%20371%2017T350%2073Q350%2092%20386%20193T423%20345Q423%20404%20379%20404H374Q288%20404%20229%20303L222%20291L189%20157Q156%2026%20151%2016Q138%20-11%20108%20-11Q95%20-11%2087%20-5T76%207T74%2017Q74%2030%20112%20180T152%20343Q153%20348%20153%20366Q153%20405%20129%20405Q91%20405%2066%20305Q60%20285%2060%20284Q58%20278%2041%20278H27Q21%20284%2021%20287Z%22%3E%3C%2Fpath%3E%0A%3C%2Fdefs%3E%0A%3Cg%20stroke%3D%22currentColor%22%20fill%3D%22currentColor%22%20stroke-width%3D%220%22%20transform%3D%22matrix(1%200%200%20-1%200%200)%22%20aria-hidden%3D%22true%22%3E%0A%20%3Cuse%20xlink%3Ahref%3D%22%23E1-MJMATHI-6E%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3C%2Fuse%3E%0A%3C%2Fg%3E%0A%3C%2Fsvg%3E)很大时，根据泊松定理可知，妇女和她的丈夫结成对的数目近似服从泊松分布。
>
